background: lerp(0, bgA, time * (posRandom(x, y) * (const('maxSpeed') - const('minSpeed')) + const('minSpeed')))
foreground: lerp(0, fgA, time * (posRandom(x, y) * (const('maxSpeed') - const('minSpeed')) + const('minSpeed')))

background: lerp(arg('startBgR'), bgR, time * (posRandom(x, y) * (const('maxSpeed') - const('minSpeed')) + const('minSpeed')))
lerp(arg('startBgG'), bgG, time * (posRandom(x, y) * (const('maxSpeed') - const('minSpeed')) + const('minSpeed')))
lerp(arg('startBgB'), bgB, time * (posRandom(x, y) * (const('maxSpeed') - const('minSpeed')) + const('minSpeed')))
lerp(arg('startBgA'), bgA, time * (posRandom(x, y) * (const('maxSpeed') - const('minSpeed')) + const('minSpeed')))
foreground: lerp(arg('startFgR'), fgR, time * (posRandom(x, y) * (const('maxSpeed') - const('minSpeed')) + const('minSpeed')))
lerp(arg('startFgG'), fgG, time * (posRandom(x, y) * (const('maxSpeed') - const('minSpeed')) + const('minSpeed')))
lerp(arg('startFgB'), fgB, time * (posRandom(x, y) * (const('maxSpeed') - const('minSpeed')) + const('minSpeed')))
lerp(arg('startFgA'), fgA, time * (posRandom(x, y) * (const('maxSpeed') - const('minSpeed')) + const('minSpeed')))

background: lerp(arg('startR'), bgR, time * (posRandom(x, y) * (const('maxSpeed') - const('minSpeed')) + const('minSpeed')))
lerp(arg('startG'), bgG, time * (posRandom(x, y) * (const('maxSpeed') - const('minSpeed')) + const('minSpeed')))
lerp(arg('startB'), bgB, time * (posRandom(x, y) * (const('maxSpeed') - const('minSpeed')) + const('minSpeed')))
lerp(arg('startA'), bgA, time * (posRandom(x, y) * (const('maxSpeed') - const('minSpeed')) + const('minSpeed')))
